Dear Jim
Further to your helpful suugestions re the lacquer inscription on =

the katchushi tsuba, is it possible that the first two kanji are 
一=
 (ichi) and 耼 (mei), as illustrated in Haynes' H 01715.0?  Even 
the=
 kao bears a (very) remote resemblance to that illustrated.
Regards, John L=
.
